sentences.english: Fixed a modifier in the church steeple that was enabling snipers to fire at drastically increased rates.
sentences.chinese: 修正一个使教堂中的狙击手射速增加的修正倍数。

sentences.english: A team of snipers has been dispatched to save those trapped.
sentences.chinese: 目前，一队狙击手已被派往被困地，随时展开救援。

sentences.english: Radiation Sniper SlugsTechnology is getting better each day.
sentences.chinese: 放射线狙击兵芯块技术正在变得比较每个日子。

sentences.english: And some sniper, bastard, started shooting.
sentences.chinese: 然后一些兔崽子狙击手就开始射击我们。

sentences.english: The sniper shoots so exactly that no one can escape his shots.
sentences.chinese: 这名狙击手的枪法很准，没人能逃过他的狙击。

sentences.english: The sniper shoots so exactly that no one can escape his shots.
sentences.chinese: 这名狙击手的枪法很准，没人能逃过他的狙击。

sentences.english: He escapes into the elevator just before Lincoln can catch him.
sentences.chinese: 狙击手逃进了电梯里，林肯差一点就抓住了他。

sentences.english: When a company commander in the report the situation to huang feng died under the sniper rifle of the devil.
sentences.chinese: 一连长在向黄鸣锋汇报战况时死在了鬼子的狙击枪下。

sentences.english: Covert Ops plays a more stealth role with the aid of a sniper rifle.
sentences.chinese: 潜行者作为一个秘密行动角色，擅长使用狙击枪。

sentences.english: They ranged in size from small handguns to powerful sniper rifles.
sentences.chinese: 其尺寸小至手枪，大至狙击枪，不一而足。

sentences.english: The sniper aimed his riffle at the man on the horse.
sentences.chinese: 狙击手用步枪瞄准了马背上的那个人。

sentences.english: It showed that the snipers had positioned themselves on the fantail of the Bainbridge.
sentences.chinese: 画面显示狙击手已经在班布里奇的尾突选好了位置。

sentences.english: The hole I strikes the rifle is the sniper special-purpose breaks far to the high accuracy rifle.
sentences.chinese: 孔I击步枪是狙击手专用的远断离高精度步枪。

sentences.english: He was ordered to snipe at anyone moving about the camp.
sentences.chinese: 他奉令狙击任何在营地附近走动的人。

sentences.english: An AT Gun by its self is easy meat for a sniper.
sentences.chinese: 一个单独的反坦克炮简直就是狙击手的活靶子。

sentences.english: You're the iper who tried to kill us on that building.
sentences.chinese: 你是那个试图杀死生化战场激活码我们的那个狙击手。

definition: sudden and violent attack/assault/fig. rushed job/concentrated effort to finish a job quickly
to ambush/to lie in wait for/to lie low/ambush
to mount a sneak attack/to raid
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots
to shoot dead (with a gun, or bow and arrow)
